mean_en: a legal agreement by which a bank or similar organization lends you money to buy a house, etc., and you pay the money back over a particular number of years; the sum of money that you borrow
sentence: He took out a mortgage, meaning he borrowed money to buy his home.
sentence_trans: 他办理过抵押贷款，这意味着他是借钱买的房子。
word_etyma: mort死 + gage抵押品 → mortgage抵押
